name: Northern Storm
description: Twist a violent storm around you, dealing 1161 Frost Damage every 1 second for 8 seconds to enemies around you and reducing their Movement Speed by 40% and increasing your Max Magicka by 15% for 30 seconds.  You and nearby allies gain Major Protection, reducing your damage taken by 10%.
effectLines: Increases your Max Magicka after activating.
